name: inkwell-api-tests
description: Newman CLI runner for Inkwell Postman API test collection

scripts.test: newman run inkwell-api.postman_collection.json --environment inkwell-api.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/report.html
scripts.test:ci: newman run inkwell-api.postman_collection.json --environment inkwell-api.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,junit --reporter-junit-export reports/junit.xml
